welcome.subtitle: Welcome
welcome.title: To comfortable holiday apartments
welcome.paragraph1: Welcome to Asterias, a small, family accommodation in the coastal village of Koronisia, just 20 minutes from the city of Arta.
welcome.paragraph2: If you are looking for tranquility, clean air, authentic hospitality and views that rest your eyes, then Asterias is the right place for you.
welcome.paragraph3: Our rooms are bright, fully equipped and ideal for couples, families or friends who want to discover the beauty of the Ambracian Gulf and the calm waters of the lagoon.

standard.name: Standard Apartment
standard.description: A beautifully furnished apartment with modern amenities, perfect for a relaxing getaway in Koronisia. All our apartments are identical in style and layout, offering consistent comfort and quality.

item1.title: Prime Location
item1.description: Nestled in the heart of Koronisia, offering breathtaking views and easy access to local attractions.

item2.title: Authentic Hospitality
item2.description: Experience genuine Greek warmth and personalized service from our dedicated team.

item3.title: Home Away From Home
item3.description: Our apartments blend traditional aesthetics with modern amenities for a unique and comfortable stay.

item4.title: Peaceful Retreat
item4.description: Wake up to lagoon views, walk among flamingos, and enjoy a summer without noise.

discover.title: Discover Koronisia
discover.description: A hidden gem in the Amvrakikos Gulf, Koronisia invites you to explore its serene landscapes, rich wildlife, and the timeless charm of a traditional fishing village. Your adventure starts at Asterias Homes.

highlight1.title: Breathtaking Views
highlight1.description: Waking up to the serene Amvrakikos Gulf from our apartment balcony was unforgettable. The view was simply stunning!
highlight1.author: Maria K.

highlight2.title: Warm & Welcoming
highlight2.description: The team at Asterias Homes made us feel like family. Their hospitality and attention to detail were exceptional.
highlight2.author: John & Sarah P.

highlight3.title: Perfect Getaway
highlight3.description: Koronisia is a paradise, and Asterias Homes is the perfect place to experience it. Peaceful, beautiful, and truly relaxing.
highlight3.author: Nikos G.

highlight4.title: Photo Spots
highlight4.description: Discover unique landscapes and perfect photo locations in the Amvrakikos wetland.

footer.description: Asterias Homes, your peaceful retreat in Koronisia, offering 7 traditional holiday apartments with authentic charm and modern comfort by the Ambracian Gulf.

header.title: About Asterias Homes
header.subtitle: Discover the story behind our luxury vacation apartments in Koronisia.

story.subtitle: Our Journey
story.title: Crafting Authentic Experiences
story.paragraph1: Nestled in the heart of the picturesque fishing village of Koronisia, Asterias Homes began with a simple vision: to offer luxury vacation apartments that blend traditional Greek hospitality with modern comforts. Our journey started over a decade ago, driven by a deep love for this unique island and a desire to share its serene beauty with travelers seeking an authentic Greek experience.
story.paragraph2: From a single family property, we've carefully developed a collection of 7 unique luxury apartments, each thoughtfully designed to provide guests with a true 'home away from home' experience. We've preserved the traditional architectural charm while integrating modern amenities that ensure comfort and convenience for every guest.
story.paragraph3: Our commitment is to provide exceptional vacation rental experiences where guests can unwind, reconnect with nature, and experience the timeless allure of the Amvrakikos Gulf. We believe in sustainable tourism and strive to operate in harmony with our pristine environment while supporting the local community. At Asterias you won't find luxury – but you will find tranquility, cleanliness and people who truly care.
story.paragraph4: Asterias was created from our love for our place and the need to offer authentic Greek hospitality to our visitors.
story.imageAlt1: View of Asterias Homes apartments with lush greenery

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph: To provide unparalleled vacation rental experiences by offering exceptional service, luxury accommodations, and a deep connection to the local culture and natural beauty of Koronisia, ensuring every guest leaves with cherished memories.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.paragraph: To be recognized as the premier vacation rental destination in Koronisia for authentic, sustainable, and enriching travel experiences, fostering a legacy of warmth, tranquility, and respect for our community and environment.

team.subtitle: Meet Our Family
team.title: Dedicated to Your Comfort
team.paragraph: At Asterias Homes, our team is more than just staff; we are a family dedicated to making your stay exceptional. With a passion for hospitality and a deep knowledge of Koronisia, we are always here to assist you, share local insights, and ensure your comfort throughout your stay.
team.imageAlt: A welcoming group photo of the Asterias Homes team

findUs.subtitle: Visit Us
findUs.title: How to Find Asterias Homes
findUs.mapTitle: Location of Asterias Homes on Google Maps

about.heroDescription: In the heart of the Amvrakikos Gulf, the ideal place for tranquility, nature, and authentic experiences.
about.locationDescription: Koronisia is a small island accessible by road, located within the lagoon. It offers rare tranquility, magical sunsets and endless nature with flamingos, herons and seabirds. Within close distance you can visit Arta and its historic bridges, Lake Voulkaria and the Ambracian Gulf, the beaches of Preveza, and fish taverns with fresh fish, 5 minutes on foot from the accommodation.
about.locationTime: Just 20 minutes from Arta and 40 minutes from Preveza. Ideal for excursions to Epirus.

experiences.item2: Lake Voulkaria and the Ambracian Gulf
experiences.item4: Fish taverns with fresh fish, 5 minutes on foot from the accommodation

welcome.title: Welcome to Koronisia
welcome.subtitle: A unique destination of tranquility and authentic hospitality.

welcome.subtitle_de: Ein einzigartiges Ziel für Ruhe und authentische Gastfreundschaft.
welcome.description: Koronisia is a small island in the Amvrakikos Gulf, known for its tranquility, nature, and traditional atmosphere. Here, all you hear is the sea and the birds.
welcome.description_en: Koronisia is a small island in the Amvrakikos Gulf, known for its tranquility, nature, and traditional atmosphere. Here, all you hear is the sea and the birds.
welcome.description_de: Koronisia ist eine kleine Insel im Amvrakischen Golf, bekannt für ihre Ruhe, Natur und traditionelle Atmosphäre. Hier hören Sie nur das Meer und die Vögel.

location.title: Koronisia, Arta – In the heart of Amvrakikos Gulf
location.description1: If you seek tranquility, nature, and authentic experiences, Koronisia is the ideal place.
location.description2: Our rooms are just a few meters from the lagoons and the Amvrakikos Gulf, in a peaceful seaside village perfect for relaxation, romantic or family getaways.
activities: Walks along the seaside path or in the village
Enjoy fresh fish at the tavernas while watching the sunset
Excursions to Arta, Preveza, Ioannina, Lefkada
slogan: Koronisia, where tranquility has a voice
